mobiles.name: bird aarakocra food vendor
mobiles.long_description: The vendor holds up a nice fat rat and smiles at you.
mobiles.description:
A fat bird with shiny feathers.  He eyes you cautiously and suggests you LIST
his wares.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra delicacy vendor
mobiles.long_description: The delicacy vendor is watching you closely.
mobiles.description:
A tall skinny bird with many black feathers.  He eyes you harshly and
suggests you LIST his rare, imported wares.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra trinket vendor
mobiles.long_description: A trinket vendor stares at her wares, enchanted by their beauty.
mobiles.description:
A beautiful bird with bright plumage stands before you.  She considers
suggesting you LIST her wares, but decides she doesn't want to part with any of
them.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran young child boy
mobiles.long_description: A young aarakocran is whistling a tune.
mobiles.description:
The child is very curious about everything about you.  He looks you over hoping
you will give him a shiny piece of metal or a pretty stone.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran young child girl
mobiles.long_description: A young aarakocran is clicking her beak.
mobiles.description:
The child is very curious about everything about you.  She looks you over
hoping you will give her a shiny piece of metal or a pretty stone.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran taxidermist
mobiles.long_description: The Aarakocran Taxidermist has his hands in a corpse.
mobiles.description:
The Aarakocran Taxidermist is adjusting a glass eye inside a lifelike
snow leopard's head.  It is obvious he does not like to be disturbed.  He
clicks his beak impatiently at you and icily suggests you type LIST.  The
jagged scar on the left side of the taxidermist's face suggests that he can
hold his own in a scrape.

mobiles.name: bird taxidermist
mobiles.long_description: The Aarakocran Taxidermist has his claws in a corpse.
mobiles.description:
The Aarakocran Taxidermist is adjusting a glass eye inside a lifelike
snow leopard's head.  It is obvious he does not like to be disturbed.  He
clicks his beak impatiently at you and icily suggests you type LIST.  The
jagged scar on the right side of the taxidermist's face suggests that he can
hold his own in a scrape.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra child lame
mobiles.long_description: A young aarakocra looks uncomfortable in his wing and arm cast.
mobiles.description:
This young bird drank too much and tried to fly home, crashing into the side
of a cliff.  He won't be able to fly until his arm bone has knitted back
together again.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra commander military
mobiles.long_description: You want to shield your ears from the incredible humming given off by the military commander!
mobiles.description:
The humming commander was moving tokens representing Aarakocran
soldiers around a map, but he pushes that aside and lunges at your throat!

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra commander holy
mobiles.long_description: You want to shield your eyes from the incredible glow of the holy commander!
mobiles.description:
The commander was calculating a new backbreaking tax on an abacus, but
 he pushes that aside and lunges at your throat!

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran warrior
mobiles.long_description: A fierce warrior rolls his eyes and decides to slay you...
mobiles.description:
The proud Aarakocran warrior defends his city against all threats.  He has
decided you are a threat.  Prepare to die, dirt dweller!

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran guard
mobiles.long_description: A stalwart warrior chokes on his worm crisps and draws his blade!
mobiles.description:
The proud Aarakocran warrior defends his city against all threats.  He has
decided you are a threat.  Prepare to die, dirt dweller!

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran revolutionary castro
mobiles.long_description: A revolutionary plots the overthrow of his corrupt government.
mobiles.description:
The bitter revolutionary is plotting to overthrow his corrupt government.  He
has been secretly flying about building an organization against the corrupt
commanders of the southern stronghold.  He feels that most Aarakocrans were
much better off before merchant outsiders corrupt Aarakocran ideals.  You
represent such a threat, and you can see his eyes smoldering with inner hatred.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra junk dealer fred
mobiles.long_description: A junk dealer tries to eek out a living.
mobiles.description:
A fat bird with a bad slouch.  He is festooned with all kinds of shiny and dull
metal objects.  His name is Fred.  He asks if you are interested in a bargain?

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran merchant
mobiles.long_description: A merchant is on his way to a meeting.
mobiles.description:
The business man has an intent look in his eye.  He is much to busy to be
concerned with you...

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran matron
mobiles.long_description: An aarakocran matron eyes you cautiously.
mobiles.description:
The matron looks down at you through her long, superior beak.  She thinks
having your kind here is an insult to her people.  She considers slaying you,
but decides you will probably get killed soon without her help.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran clansman
mobiles.long_description: An aarakocran clansman is rooting for grubs.
mobiles.description:
The clansman pulls a fat, juicy grub worm from the ground and pops it into his
beak.  Your mouth waters as you imagine the delicate texture of the grub.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran captain
mobiles.long_description: The Aarakocran slashes at you!
mobiles.description:
Although the captain has been sitting at as desk for the last few years, she
can still hold her own in a scrape.  The bald patches in her feathers are not a
sign of disease but reminders of the day she slew two dragons singlehandedly.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocran secretary
mobiles.long_description: The Secretary decides to prevent you from disturbing the captain!
mobiles.description:
Although you are dazzled by the brilliant plumage on the secretary, you can
see he was chosen for his intelligence and strength.  His wing muscles bulge
impressively, and you notice this is the first aarakocran you have seen with
really beefy legs as a powerful KICK knocks the wind out of you.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran weapons vendor
mobiles.long_description: An Aarakocran weapons vendor is sharpening some talon extenders on a stone.
mobiles.description:
The vendor has no problems looking at you and carrying on a conversation as
he sharpens two pairs of talon extenders simultaneously on a round sharpening
wheel he is spinning with one of his feet.  The other foot is working a bellows
for a large metal furnace.
   He looks powerful enough to claw your face to shreds with a single swath.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran armorer armourer
mobiles.long_description: An Aarakocran armorer is hammering out a bit of plate.
mobiles.description:
As the armorer looks up at you, the hammer comes down upon his claw and he
lets out a piercing shriek.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran shaman holy guildmaster
mobiles.long_description: Your guildmaster patiently adds a new tile to a huge mosaic.
mobiles.description:
The shaman's plumage is generally a drab grey, but there is a tremendous
orange and yellow starburst on her chest.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran sneaky guildmaster thief assassin
mobiles.long_description: Your guildmaster is picking a *HUGE* (Glowing) Mithral lock.
mobiles.description: well, COUNT your money!

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran strong guildmaster warrior hero
mobiles.long_description: ..998..999..1000.  Your guildmaster sets down some *HUGE* barbells.
mobiles.description:
Your guildmaster's plumage is so black that it is blue.  You can see huge
muscles rippling down his legs, wings, and chest.  He has an air of command and
military discipline.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran cityguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A cityguard scans the horizon for signs of trouble.
mobiles.description:
The cityguard is charged with keeping peace within the city.  She is especially
on the lookout for the person who stole from the military treasury last week.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran cityguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A cityguard scans the horizon for signs of trouble.
mobiles.description:
The cityguard is charged with keeping peace within the city.  He is especially
on the lookout for the person who stole from the military treasury last week.

mobiles.name: bird aarakocra aarakocran cityguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A cityguard is guarding the temple.
mobiles.description:
The cityguard is charged with defending the temple against invaders from the
north.

mobiles.name: bat breakfast lunch dinner snack appetizer
mobiles.long_description: A bat brings back memories of your mother's great cooking.
mobiles.description:
A recipe comes to mind...
      Ingredients:
         1 small bat
         1 small yellow pepper
         1 spoon vindaloo paste

      Directions:
         place pepper in bat's mouth
         smear paste on stomach and tie wings together
         roast on stick until golden brown

   (leg of a small bat also makes a handy snack!)

mobiles.name: kobold
mobiles.long_description: A kobold has been staked to the ground.
mobiles.description:
When you look into the kobolds eyes you learn more about pain, suffering,
torture, and humiliation than you could have learned in a score of years.
The kobold only has one thing that is important to him, and that is a rock,
and people keep taking it from him endlessly.  He is guarding a rock with
his pitiful life, but occasionally closes his eyes and lets out a whimpering
moan.

objects.name: worm crisps
objects.description: You are enticed by the odor of spicy worm crisps.

objects.name: bowl curry curried grubs
objects.description: You smell the delicate aroma of curried grubs.

objects.name: cup spicy rodent stew
objects.short_description: a cup of spicy rodent stew
objects.description: A cup with some red liquid rests here.

objects.name: meat seasoned rat kabob
objects.description: Some meat and vegetables on a stick lies on the ground.

objects.name: raw worms rice
objects.description: Your mouth waters at the sight of raw worms.

objects.name: talon extenders
objects.description: Some shiny metal talons catch your fancy.

objects.name: packet black centipede spice
objects.short_description: spice of the black, aquatic centipede
objects.description: A packet of black spice has been forgotten here.

objects.name: seaweed
objects.description: You smell the dreamy smell of seaweed.

objects.name: chameleon
objects.description: A small chameleon corpse blends in with the ground.

objects.name: giant squid eye eyeball
objects.short_description: the eye of a giant squid
objects.description: An eyeball looks up at you strangely.

objects.name: shiny bit green glass
objects.short_description: a shiny bit of green glass
objects.description: You see a shiny bit of green glass and need to possess it.

objects.name: shiny bit blue glass
objects.short_description: a shiny bit of blue glass
objects.description: You see a shiny bit of blue glass and decide it will soon be yours.

objects.name: gold circlet
objects.description: You have a sudden urge to pick up a bright gold circlet.

objects.name: piece string
objects.description: The most beautiful piece of string you have ever seen rests here.

objects.name: silver coin disk
objects.description: A shiny silver disk seems to call your name.

objects.name: red glass
objects.description: You decide the important thing in your life is having some red glass.

objects.name: ball string
objects.description: A ball of string asks to be unrolled and hidden in your nest.

objects.name: red string thread
objects.description: A thin piece of string has the deepest color you have ever seen.

objects.name: gem garnet stone
objects.description: A gem glows with a mystical inner light.

objects.name: nest
objects.description: A fancy nest of string and straw seems very inviting.

objects.name: nest
objects.description: A straw nest with shiny twigs makes you feel sleepy.

objects.name: nest
objects.description: A huge family nest of rough twigs looks preferable to adventuring.

objects.name: hand ashtray
objects.description: An ashtray made out of the hand of a smurf lies on the floor.

objects.name: stuffed snow leopard
objects.description: A magnificent stuffed snow leopard almost appears to be walking.

objects.name: stuffed jaguar
objects.description: A stuffed giant king jaguar appears to pace menacingly.

objects.name: stuffed orc
objects.description: A stuffed orc in combat pose is glued to the floor.

objects.name: stuffed grizzly bear
objects.description: A stuffed grizzly bear prepares to maul you.

objects.name: dragon head
objects.description: A fierce dragon's head is nailed to the wall.

objects.name: glass eye
objects.description: A glass eye looks back at you.

objects.name: glass eye
objects.description: A flawed glass eye looks back at you.

objects.name: painting
objects.description: A strange bird painting hangs on the wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
The painting is of an aarakocran shaman, and appears very lifelike.  The eyes
seem to follow you about the room.  The painting begins to speak!  The Shaman
utters 'xipodf sdfi dsfiop ewroia !wuer' which you recognize as being some kind
of curse on the old Aarakocran high tongue.

objects.name: hand ashtray
objects.description: An ashtray made out of the hand of a dwarf lies on the floor.

objects.name: canoe
objects.description: A canoe is lies here unused.

extra_descriptions.description: Hey!  This canoe has a hole in it!

objects.name: chain collar
objects.description: An empty chain and collar rest here.

objects.name: bottle potion clear
objects.short_description: a clear potion with feathers inside
objects.description: Feathers float about inside a clear bottle.

objects.name: tapestry
objects.description: A faded tapestry depicts the famous "Battle of the 1000".

objects.name: sword
objects.description: You see a sword here.

objects.name: mace
objects.description: You see a mace here.

objects.name: vest
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture open-winged vest here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This vest has been designed to give proper room for large wing muscles, and
has holes in the back which are large enough to allow you to put it on and
take it off without getting your feathers caught.

objects.name: shield spiked
objects.description: You see a shield here.

objects.name: cloak
objects.description: You see a cloak here.

objects.name: helmet
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture full-view helmet here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This helmet has been designed to give you an unobstructed view of a full 180
degrees.  There is also a cleverly designed beak guard to allow you to eat and
drink without removing the helmet.

objects.name: leggings
objects.description: You see a pair of leggings here.

objects.name: boots
objects.description: You see a pair of Aarakocran-manufacture boots here.

extra_descriptions.description: These boots have large toe holes, to accommodate large Aarakocran feet.

objects.name: talon extenders talons
objects.description: You see a pair of talon extenders here.

objects.name: wing guards wingguards
objects.description: You see a pair of wing guards here.

objects.name: cape
objects.description: You see a cape here.

objects.name: belt
objects.description: You see a belt here.

objects.name: bracer
objects.description: You see a bracer here.

objects.name: vest
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture open-winged vest here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This vest has been designed to give proper room for large wing muscles, and
has holes in the back which are large enough to allow you to put it on and
take it off without getting your feathers caught.

objects.name: shield spiked
objects.description: You see a wicked, spiked shield here.

objects.name: cloak
objects.description: You see a cloak here.

objects.name: helmet
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture full-view helmet here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This helmet has been designed to give you an unobstructed view of a full 180
degrees.  There is also a cleverly designed beak guard to allow you to eat and
drink without removing the helmet.

objects.name: leggings
objects.description: You see a pair of leggings here.

objects.name: boots
objects.description: You see a pair of Aarakocran-mangufacture boots here.

extra_descriptions.description: These boots have large toe holes, to accommodate large Aarakocran feet.

objects.name: talon extenders
objects.description: You see a pair of talon extenders here.

objects.name: sleeves
objects.description: You see a pair of sleeves here.

objects.name: cape
objects.description: You see a cape here.

objects.name: belt
objects.description: You see a belt here.

objects.name: bracer
objects.description: You see a bracer here.

objects.name: purse
objects.description: A generic purse generates the VNUM for the 'make purse' spell.

objects.name: fire campfire
objects.description: There are the remains of a campfire here.

objects.name: gold key
objects.description: A shiny key gives a glint of gold.

objects.name: string green thread
objects.short_description: a frayed bit of green thread
objects.description: A piece of string, beautiful beyond measure, looks loose.

objects.name: stuffed polar bear
objects.description: A stuffed polar bear prepares to maul you.

objects.name: small talon extenders
objects.description: A pair of small shiny metal talons catch your fancy.

objects.name: small mace
objects.description: You see a small mace here.

objects.name: small sticker
objects.description: A small rat sticker would come in handy, and there is one here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This is a medium length piercing blade, primarily used to catch rats.  It is
fairly long, but the point is about as long as a dagger's.  The sticker looks
as sturdy as a short sword.

objects.name: large sticker
objects.description: A large rat sticker causes you to dream of a large rat dinner.

extra_descriptions.description:
This is a long metal blade, primarily used to catch rats.  It is about as big
as a small sword, and has a sharp slashing blade.  It looks as sturdy as a
short sword.

objects.name: helmet
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture full-view helmet here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This helmet has been designed to give you an unobstructed view of a full 180
degrees.  There is also a cleverly designed beak guard to allow you to eat and
drink without removing the helmet.

objects.name: vest
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture open-winged vest here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This vest has been designed to give proper room for large wing muscles, and
has holes in the back which are large enough to allow you to put it on and
take it off without getting your feathers caught.

objects.name: boots
objects.description: You see a pair of Aarakocran-mangufacture boots here.

extra_descriptions.description: These boots have large toe holes, to accommodate large Aarakocran feet.

objects.name: lump metal
objects.description: A lump of shiny metal is a good thing to carry around and possess.

objects.name: pick lockpick metal bit
objects.description: A L-shaped bit of metal has been left on the ground.

objects.name: bottle alcohol rotgut
objects.description: You are surprised to see a bottle of alcohol out in the open.

objects.name: cracked crystal ball
objects.description: A broken crystal ball has been abandoned here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You shake the crystal ball, and hold it in front of your eyes.  In a few
seconds, a small blue tetrahedron floats to the surface.  Written on the face
of the tetrahedron are the words 'please shake me again'.

objects.name: rock
objects.description: A worthless rock that is very important to a lonely kobold rests here.

extra_descriptions.description:
When you look at the rock, you think of a lonely kobold balling his eyes
out in some dinghy back room.

objects.name: flying helmet
objects.description: You see an Aarakocran-manufacture leather flying helmet here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This helmet is made of leather and covers the entire face and upper beak.
Glass protects the eyes while leaving view unobstructed.

objects.name: wing guards wingguards
objects.short_description: a pair of tough leather wing guards
objects.description: You see a pair of tough leather wing guards here.

objects.name: fountain water
objects.description: A large fountain gushes forth here.

objects.name: cannon tube
objects.description: A mysterious thick metal tube rests here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The revolutionary is experimenting with gunpowder from the far east, in an
attempt to create a 'super weapon'.

objects.name: skin waterskin
objects.description: A soggy leather skin looks like it might hold water.

objects.name: bug glowbug chitin
objects.description: You see the shiny chitin of a dead glowbug.

rooms.name: Flying
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You sense that the wind patterns
are shifting, something very strange is going on below.

exits.description:
You see some strange things in the air below you.  Below, creatures
mill about and the wind seems rather strange.

rooms.name: Flying
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.name: Flying
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.name: The Taxidermist's Gallery
rooms.description:
You gape in amazement at how incredibly lifelike some of the stuffed animals
and trophies appear.

exits.description: You see the sales counter.

rooms.name: Temple of the Rising Sun
rooms.description:
You stand in a huge temple hewn directly from the cliff wall.  Giant murals
depict fierce Aarakocran warriors flying into battle on the tails of
whirlwinds.  There is a small plaque at eye level.

exits.description: You see the guard shack.
You see the private chambers of the Chief shaman.

You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

You see a narrow staircase has been cut into the rock here, to allow visiting
traders access to the market.  (You sincerely hope that you don't slip, as you
can see some wicked jagged rocks between breaks in the clouds below, GULP!)

extra_descriptions.description:
Slash decided when he was 17 years old to leave behind the strife and class
struggle in the Aarakocran capital and learn the skills of adventure.  He
did not return until 100 years later.  He now returns regularly to visit his
cousin the taxidermist.

The mural depicts thousands of Aarakocran warriors spiraling in rapid descent
upon an army of depraved gnome archers.  Blood and gore seem to be the
primary themes, and here and there you see Aarakocrans dismembering the craven
archers and eating the severed limbs.  You start to think these Aarakocrans are
a sick bunch.

rooms.name: Shaman's private chambers
rooms.description:
You stand in a holy room.  The walls are covered with astrological symbols,
calendars, and star charts.
   In the center of the room is a huge mosaic, made of thousands of bits of
glass.

extra_descriptions.description:
You stare in awe at the aching beauty of a quarter-completed mosaic of a huge
glowing egg in the most perfect nest you have ever seen.  Each piece of the
mosaic is a piece of glass colored and cut so perfectly that you feel this is
what heaven must be like.

rooms.name: The Dump
rooms.description:
Wait, this isn't the dump!  Behind all of this mess is a beaten up table.
You see a lot of things, but nothing here is very pretty or very shiny, and you
decide to leave.

extra_descriptions.description:
Lamont is not here, you idiot!  He is out driving the truck.  Get back to
to game!

rooms.name: Runed stall
rooms.description: This stall is painted with strange gold runes, such as triangles and eyes.

rooms.name: A Food vendor's stall
rooms.description:
You stand before a brightly colored stall.  Small animals and large insects
are hanging from racks all around you.

rooms.name: Top of Market Square
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a huge bazaar.  There are stalls to the West and
East.  A staircase has been built out of sandstone leading down, and you see
some more stalls down there.  If you attempt to go South you will fall off the
side of the cliff city.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: A Food vendor's stall
rooms.description:
You stand before a drab colored stall.  Small animals and large insects are
hanging from racks all around you.

exits.description: You see the warrior's guild.

You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: Warrior's guild
rooms.description:
This building has no exit to the south, as the warriors do not like having
their privacy violated.  You see lots of equipment to practice with, and a
huge set of weights.

rooms.name: The Taxidermy Stand
rooms.description:
The first thing you notice about the taxidermy shop is the odor of tanned
hides.



A giant grizzly bear's slash *** DEMOLISHES *** you.
A giant grizzly bear's slash *** DEMOLISHES *** you.




   Wait, it is only a stuffed bear in a lifelike pose.  You also see a
collection of heads, including a roc's, a dragon's, and a minotaur's.  There
is a large gallery to the east.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...
You see a display gallery to the west.

rooms.name: Armory stall
rooms.description:
There is a large, battered anvil here and a bunch of little bits of metal
and bronze.  Most of what the armorer is selling looks pretty old, but you
stop to ask if he has anything newer under the counter.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: Bottom of Market Square
rooms.description:
You are at the bottom of the market square.  Stalls continue to your East
and West, while dwellings lie to the Down.  To the South, you see a (Glowing)
(Shimmering) (Pulsating) blue ball, about 10' across, hovering in the air.

exits.description:
It looks passable, but beware!  A single slip could start you sliding
d
o
w
n
.
.
.
You think you can see jagged rocks through the clouds below, but you are not
sure...

rooms.name: A jeweler's stall
rooms.description:
You stand in front of a big beautiful bird with bright plumage.  The stall
is painted in bright colors and features a mural of fierce bird warriors
attacking a dragon sitting on a huge pile of gold and gems.

rooms.name: The Weaponsmith's stall
rooms.description:
This stall looks like it has expended very rapidly, and has almost become a
shop.  It doesn't look like the weaponsmith couldn't take down the stall very
easily, as he has installed a blast furnace, a grinding wheel, and some forging
equipment.

exits.description: You see the Warrior's guild.

rooms.name: A stone dwelling
rooms.description:
You are inside a large building constructed from standstone and mortar.  There
is a latrine in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: A Guard Shack
rooms.description:
You see a small wooden shack before you.  It doesn't look very well designed
to you.  There is a big sign in front of the shack.  The sign is covered with
what you consider chicken scratchings.

exits.description: You see a temple.

rooms.name: A stone dwelling
rooms.description:
You are inside a large building constructed from standstone and mortar.  There
is a latrine in the southeast corner.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: A stone dwelling
rooms.description:
You are inside a large building constructed from standstone and mortar.  There
is a latrine in the southeast corner.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: Town Square
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of the Town Square.  Stone dwellings lie to the East
and West, and the Bazaar lies to the Up.  There is a path to the Down.  There
is nothing to the South.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

You feel that you can jump from rock to rock and scale on your belly long
enough to get to some small huts you see to the DownEast.  You can clearly
see some wicked, jagged crags through a part in the clouds below.

rooms.name: A stone dwelling
rooms.description:
You are inside a large building constructed from sandstone and mortar on the
south wall, and using the north face of the canyon as the north wall.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: A stone dwelling
rooms.description:
You are inside a large building constructed from sandstone and mortar on the
south wall, and using the north face of the canyon as the north wall.

rooms.name: On the north cliff face
rooms.description:
It looks like you could slide back on your belly a bit to the East, but
forget about going West, it's much to steep.  There is a little bit of level
ground Down from here, but there is no way you could reach it.  You see the
outside of a stone building built right into the cliff face above you, but the
climb is too steep.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: The Shanty town
rooms.description:
You are in an area of straw huts constructed by the less prosperous
Aarakocrans in a vain attempt to emulate the stone buildings to the Up.  These
structures do not have the natural permanence of the well built buildings or
the traditional nests, and the residents spend most of their time keeping them
together.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: A rough stone path
rooms.description:
You are on a rough stone path on the north cliff face.  Your passage East and
West is blocked, but you may still move Up and Down.  There is nothing to the
south.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: Thieves guild
rooms.description:
The thieves guild is pretty small, as most thieves have left the city for
bigger and better booties, but the recent prosperity of the shopkeepers has
caused operations to begin expanding again.
You see a thin leather book tied to a string on the wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
The book is titled 'So You Want to be a Thief', by someone named Slash.

   The book has the following chapters you can LOOK at.  (Don't even think of
nicking this book.)

   Chapter 1:  So you have decided to become a thief  (LOOK NEWBIE)
   Chapter 2:  Stealing, Nicking and Borrowing        (LOOK STEAL)
   Chapter 3:  The Art of surprise                    (LOOK BACKSTAB)
   Chapter 4:  Sneaking around where you don't belong (LOOK SNEAK)

   It looks like someone nicked the rest of the book...

Ok, you have made it to the thieves guild.  I will assume that you know how
to do things like PRACtice and talk to the other players, and know to run away
from a fight you can't win.

   The guildmaster here is very good at teaching you the tools of the trade.
However, he is a lot more interested in staying in this room and picking that
big lock than he is in helping you.  He is not going to tell you what to
study or give you hints on how to rob.  If you are having trouble figuring out
what skills to PRACtice, use the CANT command to speak to the other thieves on
line.  They will help you.  (This book also has a few pointers.)

Steal lets you take things from players and mobs without having to fight
them for it.  You won't get any experience points for using this or any other
thieving skill, but you can get money and objects pretty quick.
   To steal money, use STEAL <number> <character>.  To steal an object, use
STEAL <object> <character>.  The object must be in the character's inventory,
not worn.  You want to know what the character has in the inventory to steal,
so you will need to PRACtice PEEK, too.
   I have staked a kobold to the ground.  He has a ROCK in his inventory.  Try
to steal it from him.  When you have gotten the rock, please give the rock
back to the kobold so the other thieves can steal it from him.  Notice that you
can't steal the collar off of him.

Backstab lets you sneak up behind a mob (but not a player) and hit the
really hard in the back with a dagger.  This does a lot of extra damage, and
you should have a much easier time finishing him off.  You need to use a small
dagger-type weapon to do this, a big slashing sword doesn't have the right kind
of point.
   If you are grouped with some warriors, they will tell you that you have to
backstab the mob.  If you do this, the mob will attack only you and they will
take no damage.  You should make them use their skills and RESCUE you.
   Don't use this skill until you are at least GOOD at it.  Otherwise you will
be wasting your first attack with a pitiful backstab attempt...

Sneak and hide are used on players, not mobs.  DO NOT EXPECT TO BE ABLE TO
WALK INTO AN AGGRESSIVE AREA stealthily.  Use invisibility for this...

rooms.name: On the north cliff face
rooms.description:
You can easily climb up to a stone building built into the shelf above you.
You *might* be able to go down, but I wouldn't try it...

exits.description:
It looks a bit too steep...  You might be able to get down, though getting up
is clearly impossible.  You have an excellent view of some buzzards circling
around a large animal about 2000' feet down...

rooms.name: On the north cliff face
rooms.description:
You are standing on a part of the cliff that is at about a 45% angle.  You
can stay here as long as you want.  You are glad sandstone is a very strong
and sturdy geological formation.
   There are too many clouds below to see if the buzzards circle below this
point.

rooms.name: Small level area on the cliff face
rooms.description:
You stand on a small level area on the cliff face.  Better stay here, it
looks like a single step in any direction would leave you heading down at a
rapid speed.  The good news is that the cliff is so steep here you would
probably survive your fall all the way to the bottom far below...

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: On the north cliff face
rooms.description:
The view from up here is quite breathtaking.  You can see down for at least
half a mile.  You wish to stay here and soak up nature's beauty almost as much
as the last guy who stopped here, and he left claw marks for at least 50' down
the side of the crag.  You wave at his bones below and commend his good taste.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: The Shanty town
rooms.description:
You are in an area of straw huts constructed by the less prosperous
Aarakocrans in a vain attempt to emulate the stone buildings to the Up.  These
structures do not have the natural permanence of the well built buildings or
the traditional nests, and the residents spend most of their time keeping them
together.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: Bend in the path
rooms.description:
Actually more of a natural feature of the north cliff wall than a path, this
bend allows you to leave Up or continue East.  There is nothing to the South.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: The Shanty town
rooms.description:
You are in an area of straw huts constructed by the less prosperous
Aarakocrans in a vain attempt to emulate the stone buildings to the Up.  These
structures do not have the natural permanence of the well built buildings or
the traditional nests, and the residents spend most of their time keeping them
together.
You spy some footprints leading to the North, which stop suddenly right at
the cliff wall.

exits.description:
There appears to be some kind of opening in the cliff face to the north.  In
fact, what you thought was the cliff face is a cave that is completely
obscured.

You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: The Shanty town
rooms.description:
You are in an area of straw huts constructed by the less prosperous
Aarakocrans in a vain attempt to emulate the stone buildings to the Up.  These
structures have neither the natural permanence of the well built buildings or
the strength of traditional nests, and the residents spend most of their time
keeping these huts together.

rooms.name: On the north cliff face
rooms.description:
The vegetation has thinned out here and you can't see much of anything
except stone.  You way is blocked to the West, but you can continue East.
There is nothing to the south.

rooms.name: A primitive area
rooms.description:
You feel a sense of stepping into another time.  All around you are
traditional family nests which look warm and friendly.  There is none of the
hustle and bustle of the sprawling city to the north.  You wish things looked a
little less drab, though.  The cliff face looks impassible to the west.

exits.description:
There are no more ladders and stairs going down, because there are no flat
areas below this ledge.

rooms.name: A primitive area
rooms.description:
You feel a sense of stepping into another time.  All around you are
traditional family nests which look warm and friendly.  There is none of the
hustle and bustle of the sprawling city to the north.  You wish things looked a
little less drab, though.

exits.description:
There are no more ladders and stairs going down, because there are no flat
areas below this ledge.

rooms.name: A narrow area on the shelf
rooms.description:
The shelf here is too narrow to place anything upon.  In fact, it is about
as wide as your feet.  Your arm is holding on to the cliff face to the north.
You feel much more secure than the last guy who tried to walk here, and you can
still see his sun bleached bones on a small outcropping about 1500' down...
   The shelf widens to the West.

exits.description:
There is a small outcropping about 1500' down, but it is not big enough to
attempt to land upon.

rooms.name: A primitive area
rooms.description:
You feel a sense of stepping into another time.  All around you are
traditional family nests which look warm and friendly.  There is none of the
hustle and bustle of the sprawling city to the north.  You wish things looked a
little less drab, though.

exits.description:
There are no more ladders and stairs going down, because there are no flat
areas below this ledge.

rooms.name: A primitive area
rooms.description:
You feel a sense of stepping into another time.  All around you are
traditional family nests which look warm and friendly.  There is none of the
hustle and bustle of the sprawling city to the north.  You wish things looked a
little less drab, though.

exits.description:
There are no more ladders and stairs going down, because there are no flat
areas below this ledge.

rooms.name: A narrow area on the shelf
rooms.description:
You can walk West on the a small shelf in the cliff wall, but you are
blocked to the East, and Down is much too steep.  There is nothing to the
South.  You can probably get back up if the tree limb you are holding on to
doesn't snap off under the weight of your armor.

exits.description:
IT IS WAY TO STEEP TO KEEP GOING DOWN!  YOU WOULD DIE!
(Even if you are able to fly, there is nothing interesting down from here.
This canyon is actually a huge chasm that goes deep into the earth, there is
lots of boiling hot lava and stuff down there that would burn your flesh.  I
could write 500 rooms of 'it's getting a little hotter' before I describe your
firey demise, but you really aren't worth the trouble.)

rooms.name: Flying in the canyon 40 yards south of the temple
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You feel proud to be an Aarakocran,
and you catch a new thermal...

exits.description: You see a bright white temple.

rooms.name: Flying in the canyon 40 yards south of the market square
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You feel proud to be an Aarakocran,
and you catch a new thermal...

exits.description: You see the market square.

rooms.name: Flying
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.name: Flying
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.description:

rooms.description:

rooms.description:

and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.name: Flying
rooms.description:
Ahh; to be in the air again, unencumbered by the cares of the material world
and flying free above all other creatures.  You stop paying attention to your
location and adventuring ceases to interest you.

rooms.name: Small ledge on the South cliff face
rooms.description:
You are standing on a small ledge on the South face of the cliff.  There is
nothing to the North, and you are totally blocked on all sides by steep cliff
walls.

exits.description: A big stone blocks your path.

extra_descriptions.description:
The stone looks pretty heavy.  In fact, this would be the perfect stone to
roll down the cliff if something really big and nasty was coming up at you.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description:
There is a large cave entrance to the South, and you can walk East along a
narrow ledge.  There is nothing to the North.
   There is some (Flaming) writing on the cave entrance.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

extra_descriptions.description:
The wall reads:
   'xewd ipowed wek;s !dw l;kwe asdw al;klw e! weiposdf wer af wer aer
   'eripaisd aserk weop erop weo !d !k sk;l wer oip as aslk psfo ase feo
   'poewr k; ipoe sd oew od ewpori sdipo werip asdf opijlsd hoise !ks fsd.

A Common translation is provided below:
   'We will eat your heart, invader, but your entrails are so foul as to choke
   'even us!

Below that is written in a flowing script:
   'Guys, they are not kidding.  Stay out of this cave unless you are at least
level 20, even in groups...                   --Slash

rooms.name: On the south cliff face
rooms.description:
You are walking on a narrow East-West ledge on the south face of a steep
cliff.  There is nothing to the North.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: On the south cliff face
rooms.description:
You are walking on a narrow East-West ledge on the south face of a steep
cliff.  There is nothing to the North.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: On the south cliff face
rooms.description:
You are walking on a narrow East-West ledge on the south face of a steep
cliff.  There is nothing to the North.

exits.description:
You see the freedom of the air!  Ah, to soar again, free of all your cares
gliding on thermals above the clouds...

rooms.name: On the south cliff face
rooms.description:
You are at the end of a narrow ledge on the south face of a steep cliff.
You are blocked to the East, but the West looks passable.   There is nothing to
the North.

rooms.name: Inside the stronghold
rooms.description:
The inside of this cave has been straightened into a passable corridor.
The Aarakocran high command uses this cave to handle defense of the valley as
the south face of the valley is not reachable except from the air.
   Judging from the high quality of the furniture around you, you should be
able to find some very valuable shiny stuff.  Your heart races as you imagine
yourself living in such splendor one day.

exits.description: It looks like there might be some very nice things down there.

rooms.name: Inside the stronghold
rooms.description:
You wonder where all the valuables are kept.  You see some nice tapestries
around, but nothing you can take home with you.

exits.description: It looks like there might be some very nice things down there.

rooms.name: Inside the stronghold
rooms.description:
You wonder where all the valuables are kept.  You see some nice tapestries
around, but nothing you can take home with you.

exits.description: It looks like there might be some very nice things down there.

rooms.name: Inside the stronghold
rooms.description:
You wonder where all the valuables are kept.  You see some nice tapestries
around, but nothing you can take home with you.

exits.description: It looks like there might be some very nice things down there.

rooms.name: Inside the stronghold
rooms.description:
You wonder where all the valuables are kept.  You see some nice tapestries
around, but nothing you can take home with you.  The corridor dead ends here.

rooms.name: Small ledge on the South cliff face
rooms.description:
You are standing on a small ledge on the South face of the cliff.  There is
nothing to the North, and you are totally blocked on all sides by steep cliff
walls.

rooms.name: Planning Room
rooms.description:
It doesn't look like there are any valuables here.  You don't understand how
anyone could plan anything without nice things around to bring peace and
comfort.

rooms.name: War Room
rooms.description:
It doesn't look like there are any valuables here.  You don't understand how
anyone could fight anyone without nice things around to bring peace and
comfort.

rooms.name: Empty Room
rooms.description: It doesn't look like there are any valuables here.

rooms.name: Walkway
rooms.description: It doesn't look like there are any valuables here.

rooms.name: Captain of the Guard's office
rooms.description:
It doesn't look like there are any valuables here.  You don't understand how
anyone could work without nice things around to bring peace and comfort.

rooms.name: Secretary's Office
rooms.description:
It doesn't look like there are any valuables here.  You don't understand how
anyone could work without nice things around to bring peace and comfort.

exits.description: A big stone blocks your escape.

extra_descriptions.description:
The stone is so big it looks like the hole it is filling would be big enough
to let you escape...

rooms.name: Three way intersection
rooms.description:
You see a very nice carpet leading off to the West, and a hole leads Down.
To leave the cave complex, go Up.

rooms.name: Storage room
rooms.description:
Strangely, this 'storage room' seems to be full of boxes of drab colored
equipment and bland seed rations.  You wonder why they call it a storage room
if they are not storing anything really valuable here.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor looks frequently traveled, so you hunch down and try to look
inconspicuous.

exits.description:
There are some heavy footprints leading to the west, so I would suggest
avoiding this area and turning around right now.
   You think you hear your mother calling you.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor looks frequently traveled, so you hunch down and try to look
inconspicuous.

rooms.name: Confusing Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor splits into two sections heading N and E, both sections look
equally interesting and you have a hard time making up your mind.  It is
obvious from your footprints that W leads out of this confusing area.

rooms.name: Confusing Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor splits into two sections heading N and E, both sections look
equally interesting and you have a hard time making up your mind.  It is
obvious from your footprints that W leads out of this confusing area.

rooms.name: Confusing Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor splits into two sections heading N and E, both sections look
equally interesting and you have a hard time making up your mind.  It is
obvious from your footprints that W leads out of this confusing area.

rooms.description:
This corridor splits into two sections heading N and E, both sections look
equally interesting and you have a hard time making up your mind.  It is
obvious from your footprints that W leads out of this confusing area.

rooms.description:

equally interesting and you have a hard time making up your mind.  It is
obvious from your footprints that W leads out of this confusing area.

rooms.description:
